title: Delete a project using REST API
body:
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->
I am trying to delete a project using the REST API, I saw this one 
https://github.com/afparsons/doccano_api_client
but here also nothing present for the deleting a project from the API.

Earlier I used the following code snippet for creating project
```
import requests


class Client(object):

    def __init__(self, entrypoint='http://127.0.0.1:8000', username="username", password="password"):
        self.entrypoint = entrypoint
        self.client = requests.Session()
        
        response = self.client.post("{}/v1/auth-token".format(self.entrypoint), data={'username':username,"password":password})
        token = response.json()['token']
        self.client.headers.update({'Authorization':"Token {}".format(token), 'Accept': 'application/json'})
	#self.client.auth = (username, password)

    def fetch_projects(self):
        url = f'{self.entrypoint}/v1/projects'
        response = self.client.get(url)
        return response

    def create_project(self, name, description, project_type):
        mapping = {'SequenceLabeling': 'SequenceLabelingProject',
                   'DocumentClassification': 'TextClassificationProject',
                   'Seq2seq': 'Seq2seqProject'}
        data = {
            'name': name,
            'project_type': project_type,
            'description': description,
            'guideline': 'Hello',
            'resourcetype': mapping[project_type]
        }
        url = f'{self.entrypoint}/v1/projects'
        response = self.client.post(url, json=data)
        return response.json()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    client = Client()
    #print(client)
    project = client.create_project(name='NER project',
                                    description='example',
                                    project_type='SequenceLabeling')
    #print(project)
    
```
<!--
Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment. -->

*   Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04
*   Python Version Used: Python 3.7
*   When you install doccano: A months ago
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): docker-compose
